entries.name: Chronicle
entries.plainDescription: Cross-repo git intelligence with branch status, ahead/behind, dirty state, and recent commits.
entries.flavorLine: A living record of every front in your codebase.

entries.name: Mognet
entries.plainDescription: Unified notification relay for tool outputs, with channel routing, retries, and digest formatting.
entries.flavorLine: A reliable message network for operational updates.
